header.css: @media (max-width: 768px) { #lp01-mobile-page .topnav .mobile-logo{ padding: 5px 0 !important; }}#lp01-mobile-page{ background-color: #333;}#lp01-mobile-page .sidenav { height: 100%; /* 100% Full-height */ width: 0; /* 0 width - change this with JavaScript */ position: fixed; /* Stay in place */ z-index: 99; /* Stay on top */ top: 0; right: 0px; background-color: #111; /* Black*/ overflow-x: hidden; /* Disable horizontal scroll */ padding-top: 60px; /* Place content 60px from the top */ transition: 0.5s; /* 0.5 second transition effect to slide in the sidenav */}#lp01-mobile-page .sidenav .header-search{ margin-bottom: 20px; padding: 0 20px;}#lp01-mobile-page .sidenav .header-search form input{ border-radius: 0px; border:none;}#lp01-mobile-page .sidenav .header-search form button{ padding: 10px 15px 9px; margin-left: -5px; background: #fff;}#lp01-mobile-page .sidenav .header-search form button i{ color: #000;}#lp01-mobile-page .sidenav ul li a{ padding: 10px 20px;}/* The navigation menu links */#lp01-mobile-page .sidenav a { /* padding: 8px 8px 8px 32px; */ text-decoration: none; font-size: 18px; color: #818181; display: block; transition: 0.3s}/* When you mouse over the navigation links, change their color */#lp01-mobile-page .sidenav a:hover, .offcanvas a:focus{ color: #f1f1f1;}/* Position and style the close button (top right corner) */#lp01-mobile-page .sidenav .closebtn { position: absolute; top: 0; right: 25px; font-size: 36px; margin-left: 50px;}/* Add a black background color to the top navigation */#lp01-mobile-page .topnav { overflow: hidden;}#lp01-mobile-page .topnav .mobile-logo{ float: left; background-color: none; padding: 14px 0;}#lp01-mobile-page .topnav .mobile-logo img{ width: 100px;}#lp01-mobile-page .topnav .mobile-menu { float: right; display: block; color: #f2f2f2; text-align: center; padding: 26px 16px; text-decoration: none; font-size: 17px;}/* On smaller screens, where height is less than 450px, change the style of the sidenav (less padding and a smaller font size) */@media screen and (max-height: 450px) { .sidenav {padding-top: 15px;} .sidenav a {font-size: 18px;}}#lp01-mobile-page i{ color: #fff;}#lp01-mobile-page a i{ transition:all .5s ease;}#lp01-mobile-page a i:hover{ transform:rotate(180deg);}/*end mobile header*/@media (max-width: 480px) { #lp-header .home-logo{ padding: 10px 0 !important; } #lp-header .home-logo img{ width: 110px; }}#lp-header{ position: absolute; top: 0; z-index: 99; width: 100%; .home-logo{ padding: 15px 0; h1{ margin-bottom:0px; } } .home-header{ float: right; display: inline-flex; padding: 30px 0; .home-social{ ul{ display: inline-flex; margin-bottom: 0; li{ margin-bottom: 0; padding: 0 5px; a{ color: #998b4c; font-size: 20px; -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease; &:hover{ color:#fff; } } } } } .home-phone{ float: left; margin-right: 30px; a{ font-family: 'Bungee', cursive; color: rgba(255,255,255,1); font-weight: 400; line-height: 22px; font-size: 14px; -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease; &:hover{ color:#998b4c; } i{ color: #998b4c; font-size: 20px; margin-right: 5px; } } } }} #header{ position: relative;}#bottom-lp01-header ul { list-style-type: none; margin: 0; padding: 0; overflow: hidden; padding: 55px 0; float: right;}#bottom-lp01-header ul .header-search{ float: right;}#bottom-lp01-header ul .header-search input{ padding: 4px 7px; font-size: 17px; border: none; border-radius: 0;}#bottom-lp01-header ul .header-search button{ float: right; padding: 4px 10px; margin-right: 16px; background: #ddd; font-size: 17px; border: none; cursor: pointer;}#bottom-lp01-header li { float: left; margin: 0; padding: 14px;}#bottom-lp01-header li .fa-shopping-bag{ font-size: 18px; color: #fff; line-height: 0;}#bottom-lp01-header li a { display: block; color: #fff; text-align: center; text-decoration: none; font-size: 17px; text-transform: uppercase; position: relative;}#bottom-lp01-header li a:after { content: ''; display: block; border-bottom: 1px solid #FF8617; width: 0; position: absolute; left: 0; -webkit-transition: 1s ease; transition: 1s ease;}#bottom-lp01-header li a:hover { opacity: 1 !important; color: #FF8617;}#bottom-lp01-header li a:hover:after { width: 100%;}

content.name: lp_aboutus_desc1
content.title: Nội dung 1
content.value: Khách hàng được giảm 5% cho các hóa đơn về sau khi điểm tích lũy trên 1.000.000 vnđ.

content.name: lp_aboutus_desc2
content.title: Nội dung 2
content.value: Khách hàng được giảm 10% cho các hóa đơn về sau khi điểm tích lũy trên 2.000.000 vnđ.

content.name: lp_aboutus_desc3
content.title: Nội dung 3
content.value: Khách hàng được giảm 50% cho các thương hiệu thời trang đẳng cấp.

content.name: lp_aboutus_desc4
content.title: Nội dung 4
content.value: Flash sale - 100.000 mẫu đầm hiệu thiết kế đồng giá 255k.

content.name: lp_aboutus_desc5
content.title: Nội dung 5
content.value: Mua 5 sản phẩm giảm 50% toàn bộ sản phẩm.

content.name: lp_aboutus_desc6
content.title: Nội dung 6
content.value: Khách hàng được giảm 20% cho các mặt hàng trên 500k.

content.name: lp_aboutus_desc6
content.title: Nội dung 6
content.value: Cơ hội hoàn 100% giá trị mua hàng cho tổng trị giá hóa đơn từ 1 triệu đồng. Hoàn tối đa 5 triệu đồng mỗi khách hàng bằng phiếu ưu đãi Aeon.

aboutus.css: @media (max-width: 768px) { #lp-about .top-border{ border-top: none !important; background: none !important; padding: 10px 20px 20px 50px !important; }}#lp-about{ padding: 30px 0;}#lp-about .inner{ -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);}#lp-about .top-border{ border-top:solid 3px #FF8617; background: #fff; padding: 10px 50px 50px;}#lp-about .intro-img{ overflow: hidden; position: relative; -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease;}#lp-about .intro-img a img{ width: 100%; vertical-align: middle; transform: scale(1); -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease;}#lp-about .intro-img:hover img{ width: 100%; vertical-align: middle; transform: scale(1.05);}#lp-about .right-intro{ padding-top: 30px;}#lp-about .right-intro .content-intro{ #lp-about .right-intro .content-intro p{ font-size: 20px; font-weight: bold; line-height: 26px; color: #FF8617; text-align: center; letter-spacing: 0.5px;}#lp-about .right-intro .content-intro ul{ margin-bottom: 0;}#lp-about .right-intro .content-intro ul li{ margin-bottom: 0; line-height: 24px; text-align: justify; letter-spacing: 0.5px;}#lp-about .right-intro .content-intro .button-ab{ text-align: center;}#lp-about .right-intro .content-intro .button-ab button{ padding: 5px 25px; border: solid 2px #FF8617; margin-top: 9px; font-size: 20px; text-align: center; font-weight: bold; text-transform: uppercase; color: #015c69; -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease;}#lp-about .right-intro .content-intro .button-ab button i{ margin-right: 10px; font-size: 20px; color: #015c69;}#lp-about .right-intro .content-intro .button-ab button:hover{ background: #FF8617; color: #fff;}#lp-about .right-intro .content-intro .button-ab button:hover i{ color: #fff;}#lp-about .product-list{ border:solid 1px #eeeeee;}#lp-about .product-list .prd-content ul{ padding-top: 20px;}#lp-about .product-list .prd-content ul .prd-price{ color: #FF8617; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold;}#lp-about .product-list .prd-content ul .prd-title{ -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease; font-weight: bold; flashsale.css: @media (max-width: 768px) { #lp-flash-sale{ background-attachment: scroll !important; }}#lp-flash-sale{ background-image: url('../../images/7717.jpg'); background-attachment: fixed; background-position: center; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; position: relative; overflow: hidden; padding:30px 0;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list{ background: #fff; border:solid 1px #eeeeee; -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-img { position: relative;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-img a { display: block;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-img a img { width: 100%;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-img .tag-saleoff { position: absolute; height: 34px; width: 34px; line-height: 34px; display: inline-block; top: 5px; right: 5px; background: #FF8617; color: #fff; font-size: 12px; border-radius: 50%;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-img .tag-soldout { position: absolute; height: 34px; width: 34px; line-height: 34px; display: inline-block; top: 5px; left: 5px; background: #f66d52; color: #fff; font-size: 12px; border-radius: 50%;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-img .product-actions { position: absolute; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; z-index: 3; overflow: hidden;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-img .product-actions div { display: inline-block; margin: auto; padding: 5px 0px;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-img .product-actions div button { height: 34px; line-height: 34px; padding: 0px 5px; margin-right: 5px; background: #FF8617; color: #fff; border: 0px; outline: 0px; border-radius: 3px; float: left; -webkit-transition: all 0.6s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-img .product-actions div button:last-child { margin-right: 0px;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-img .product-actions div button.btnQuickView { width: 34px; font-size: 18px; transform: translateX(-150px);}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-img .product-actions div button.btnAddToCart { width: 34px; font-size: 18px; transform: translateX(150px);}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-img .product-actions div button.btnBuyNow { font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; transform: translateY(150px);}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-img .product-actions div button:hover { background:#FF8617;}}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-content ul{ padding-top: 20px;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-content ul .prd-price{ color: #FF8617; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-content ul .prd-title{ -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list .prd-content ul .prd-title:hover{ color:#FF8617;}#lp-flash-sale .product-list :hover .prd-img > .product-actions > div > button { transform: translate(0px) !important;}#lp-flash-sale .home-collection-countdown { margin-bottom: 30px;}#lp-flash-sale .home-collection-countdown .countdown-days{ display: inline-block; margin-right: 15px; text-transform: uppercase;}#lp-flash-sale .home-collection-countdown .countdown-days #days{ font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; background: #FF8617; color: #fff; height: 60px; width: 60px; line-height: 60px; margin-bottom: 5px;}#lp-flash-sale .home-collection-countdown .countdown-hrs{ display: inline-block; margin-right: 15px; text-transform: uppercase;}#lp-flash-sale .home-collection-countdown .countdown-hrs #hrs{ font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; background: #FF8617; color: #fff; height: 60px; width: 60px; line-height: 60px; margin-bottom: 5px;}#lp-flash-sale .home-collection-countdown .countdown-mins{ display: inline-block; margin-right: 15px; text-transform: uppercase;}#lp-flash-sale .home-collection-countdown .countdown-mins #mins{ font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; background: #FF8617; color: #fff; height: 60px; width: 60px; line-height: 60px; margin-bottom: 5px;}#lp-flash-sale .home-collection-countdown .countdown-secs{ display: inline-block; margin-right: 15px; text-transform: uppercase;}#lp-flash-sale .home-collection-countdown .countdown-secs #secs{ font-size: 24px; font-weight: bold; background: #FF8617; color: #fff; height: 60px; width: 60px; line-height: 60px; margin-bottom: 5px;}#lp-flash-sale .home-collection-countdown .countdown-secs { margin-right: 0px;}#lp-flash-sale .owl-nav .owl-prev,.owl-next span{ color:#fff; font-size:30px; font-weight:700; line-height: 38px;}#lp-flash-sale .owl-nav .owl-prev{ height: 40px; line-height: 40px; width: 40px; padding: 0; margin: 0; background: #FF8617; color: #fff; opacity: 0.6; position: absolute; top: calc(50% - 20px); border-radius: 0; left:16px;}#lp-flash-sale .owl-nav .owl-next{ height: 40px; line-height: 40px; width: 40px; padding: 0; margin: 0; background: #FF8617; color: #fff; opacity: 0.6; position: absolute; top: calc(50% - 20px); border-radius: 0; right:-14px;}

flashsale.js:
(function () {var countdownDateTime = document.getElementById('home-collection-countdown').innerHTML;console.log('handle and time',handle,countdownDateTime); var headers = {}; if (document.referrer.includes('myharavan.com')){ headers.shop = document.referrer.split('?shop=')[1].split('×tamp')[0]; } else { headers.shop = "suplo-fashion.myharavan.com"} $.ajax({ type: 'GET', url: `https://sage-inn-206908.appspot.com/lp/collections/${handle}?view=lp-detail.json`, headers:headers, dataType: 'json' }).done(function (data) { localStorage.setItem(handle,JSON.stringify(data.products)); data.products.forEach(function(product) { $('#lp-flash-sale-slider').append(setProductSaleData(product)); }); $('#lp-flash-sale-slider').owlCarousel({smartSpeed: 1000, nav: false, dots: true, loop: false, responsiveRefreshRate: 200, navText: ['', ''], responsive: { 0: { items: 2 }, 480: { items: 2 }, 768: { items: 2 }, 1000: { items: 2 } } }); }); function setProductSaleData(product){ return `
${product.sale}
${product.soldout}
  • ${product.title}
  • ${product.price_format} ${product.compare_at_price_format}
` } function countdown(time) {var countDownDate = time; countdownInterval = setInterval(function () { var now = new Date().getTime();var distance = countDownDate - now; var days = Math.floor(distance / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)); var hours = Math.floor((distance% (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24)) / (1000 * 60 * 60)); var minutes = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60 * 60)) / (1000 * 60)); varseconds = Math.floor((distance % (1000 * 60)) / 1000); document.getElementById('days').innerHTML = days; document.getElementById('hrs').innerHTML= hours; document.getElementById('mins').innerHTML = minutes; document.getElementById('secs').innerHTML = seconds; }, 1000);}countdown(countdownDateTime);})();

-moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease;}#lp-collections .product-list .prd-img { position: relative;}#lp-collections .product-list .prd-img a{ display: block;}#lp-collections .product-list .prd-img a img { width: 100%;}#lp-collections .product-list .prd-img .tag-saleoff { position: absolute; height: 34px; width: 34px; line-height: 34px; display: inline-block; top: 5px; right: 5px; background: #FF8617; color: #fff; font-size: 12px; border-radius: 50%;}#lp-collections .product-list .prd-img .tag-soldout { position: absolute; height: 34px; width: 34px; line-height: 34px; display: inline-block; top: 5px; left: 5px; background: #f66d52; color: #fff; font-size: 12px; border-radius: 50%;}#lp-collections .product-list .prd-img .product-actions { position: absolute; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; z-index: 3; overflow: hidden;}#lp-collections .product-list .prd-img .product-actions div { display: inline-block; margin: auto; padding: 5px 0px;}#lp-collections .product-list .prd-img .product-actions div button { height: 34px; line-height: 34px; padding: 0px 5px; margin-right: 5px; background: #FF8617; color: #fff; border: 0px; outline: 0px; border-radius: 3px; float: left; -webkit-transition: all 0.6s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease; &:last-child { margin-right: 0px; } &.btnQuickView { width: 34px; font-size: 18px; transform: translateX(-150px); } &.btnAddToCart { width: 34px; font-size: 18px; transform: translateX(150px); } &.btnBuyNow { font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; transform: translateY(150px); } &:hover { background:#FF8617; }}#lp-collections .product-list .prd-content ul{ padding-top: 20px;}#lp-collections .product-list .prd-content ul .prd-price{ color: #FF8617; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold;}#lp-collections .product-list .prd-content ul .prd-title{ -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease; font-weight: bold; }}#lp-collections .tab{ margin-bottom: 30px;}#lp-collections .tab .tablinks{ background: #FF8617; padding: 7px 20px; font-size: 18px; text-transform: uppercase; color: #fff; -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease;}#lp-collections .tab .tablinks:hover{ background:#015c69;}#lp-collections .tab .tablinks .active{ background:#015c69;}

collections.js:
function openTabs(evt, cityName){var i, tabcontent, tablinks,shop; tabcontent=document.getElementsByClassName('tabcontent'); for (i=0; i< tabcontent.length; i++){tabcontent[i].style.display='none' ;}tablinks=document.getElementsByClassName( 'tablinks'); for (i=0; i < tablinks.length; i++){tablinks[i].className=tablinks[i].className.replace( ' active', '');}document.getElementById(cityName).style.display='block' ; evt.currentTarget.className +=' active' ;}$(document).ready(function () {$( '#lp-collections button.tablinks:first-child').attr( 'id', 'defaultOpen'); document.getElementById( 'defaultOpen').click(); $( '.collection-tab-links').each(function () { getListProduct($(this).data( 'handle')); }); function getListProduct(handle) { var headers={ }; if (document.referrer.includes( 'myharavan.com')) { shop=h eaders.shop=d ocument.referrer.split( '?shop=')[1].split( '×tamp')[0]; } else { shop=h eaders.shop="suplo-watch.myharavan.com" } let dataProducts; if (!localStorage.getItem(handle)) { $.ajax({ type: 'GET', url: `https://sage-inn-206908.appspot.com/lp/collections/${handle}?view=lp-detail.json`, headers: headers, dataType: 'json' }).done(function (data) { localStorage.setItem(handle,JSON.stringify(data.products)); dataProducts=d ata.products; $.each(dataProducts, function (key, value) { $( '#' + handle + ' .structure-collections').append(setProductData(value)); }) }); } else { dataProducts=l ocalStorage.getItem(handle); dataProducts=J SON.parse(dataProducts); $.each(dataProducts, function (key, value) {console.log( 'value',value); $( '#' + handle + ' .structure-collections').append(setProductData(value)); }) } } function setProductData(product) { return `
${product.sale}
  • ${product.title}
  • ${product.price_format} ${product.compare_at_price_format}
` }});

content.title: Ảnh khung cho KH của mục nhận xét

content.name: review_1
content.title: Anh Phạm Thế Lợi
content.value: Tôi rất hài lòng về sản phẩm của Suplo và cũng rất thích cách chăm sóc khách hàng nhiệt tình của các bạn. Những sản phẩm của các bạn làm tôi thấy tự tin vào chính mình hơn. Tuy nhiên các tôi rất muốn có thật nhiều mẫu mới, ra liên tục để người dùng như chúng tôi có nhiều sự lựa chọn hơn. Tôi sẽ ủng hộ công ty thường xuyên vào thời gian tới

content.name: review_2
content.title: Chị Bùi Thị Minh Hà

content.name: review_5
content.title: Anh Trần Quang Hiệp
content.value: Tôi rất hài lòng về sản phẩm của Suplo và cũng rất thích cách chăm sóc khách hàng nhiệt tình của các bạn. Những sản phẩm của các bạn làm tôi thấy tự tin vào chính mình hơn. loop.name: review
loop.structure:
• {value}
  • {title}

testimonial.js: $(document).ready(function() { $('.lp01-testi-prod-carousel').owlCarousel({ smartSpeed: 1000, nav: false, dots: true, loop: false, autoplay: true, autoplayHoverPause: true, responsiveRefreshRate : 200, items:4, navText: ['', ''], responsive:{ 0:{ items:1 }, 480:{ items:1 }, 768:{ items:1 }, 1000:{ items:1 } } }) } );
testimonial.css: @media (max-width: 768px) { #lp-testimonials .lp01-testi-prod-carousel{ background:none !important; } #lp-testimonials .lp01-testi-prod-carousel .testi-list{ display: block !important; }}#lp-testimonials{ position: relative; background-image: url('{testi_bg}'); background-repeat: no-repeat; background-size: cover; background-position: center; padding: 30px 0;}#lp-testimonials .lp01-testi-prod-carousel{ background: url('{testi_over}') no-repeat scroll left center; padding: 85px;}#lp-testimonials .lp01-testi-prod-carousel .item .testi-list{ -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease; display: inline-flex; /* padding: 70px 0; */}#lp-testimonials .lp01-testi-prod-carousel .item .testi-list:hover .testi-title a{ color: #FF8617;}#lp-testimonials .lp01-testi-prod-carousel .item .testi-list .testi-img{ padding-top: 40px; width: 100%; margin: 0 auto; /* margin-bottom: 10px; */ -webkit-transition: all 0.6s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.6s ease; transition: all 0.6s ease; margin-right: 20px;}#lp-testimonials .lp01-testi-prod-carousel .item .testi-list .testi-img img{ width:100%;}#lp-testimonials .lp01-testi-prod-carousel .item .testi-list .testi-content{ padding-top: 43px;}#lp-testimonials .lp01-testi-prod-carousel .item .testi-list .testi-content .testi-title{ font-weight: bold; font-size: 18px;}#lp-testimonials .lp01-testi-prod-carousel .item .testi-list .testi-content .testi-title a{ -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease; color: #015c69;}#lp-testimonials .lp01-testi-prod-carousel .item .testi-list .testi-content .testi-title a:hover{ color:#FF8617;}#lp-testimonials .lp01-testi-prod-carousel .item .testi-list .testi-content .testi-desc{ text-align: justify; line-height: 1.6em; letter-spacing: 1px;}#lp-testimonials .owl-nav .owl-prev,.owl-next span{ color:#fff; font-size:30px; font-weight:700; line-height: 38px;}#lp-testimonials .owl-nav .owl-prev{ height: 40px; line-height: 40px; width: 40px; padding: 0; margin: 0; background: #FF8617; color: #fff; opacity: 0.6; position: absolute; top: calc(50% - 20px); border-radius: 0; left:16px;}#lp-testimonials .owl-nav .owl-next{ height: 40px; line-height: 40px; width: 40px; padding: 0; margin: 0; background: #FF8617; color: #fff; opacity: 0.6; position: absolute; top: calc(50% - 20px); border-radius: 0; right:-14px;}
testimonial.html:
• {value}
  • {title}

content.name: footer_desc
content.title: Nội dung mô tả footer
content.value: Hãy nhập địa chỉ email của bạn vào ô dưới đây để có thể nhận được tất cả các tin tức mới nhất của Suplo.

content.name: footer_copyright
content.title: Nội dung copyright
content.value: Copyrights © 2018 by Suplo. Powered by Haravan

footer.css: /*footer*/#lp-footer{ line-height: 25px; background: #222522;}#lp-footer .copyright{ color: #fff; background: #000; padding: 10px 0;}#lp-footer .content-footer{ padding: 30px 0; position: relative; z-index: 99; color: #fff; width: 500px; margin: 0 auto; text-align: center;}#lp-footer .content-footer a{ color: #fff; -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease;}#lp-footer .content-footer a:hover{ color:#998b4c;}#lp-footer h3{ font-weight: bold !important; color: #fff; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 18px; letter-spacing: 1px;}#lp-footer ul li a{ -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease; color: #fff;}#lp-footer ul li a:hover{ color:#998b4c;}#lp-footer .ft-social{ display: inline-flex;}#lp-footer .ft-social li{ padding:0 10px;}#lp-footer .ft-social li i{ font-size: 20px; color: #fff; -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease;}#lp-footer .ft-social li i:hover{ color:#998b4c;}#lp-footer span{ font-weight: bold; color: #fff;}#lp-footer form { margin-bottom: 20px;}#lp-footer form input { width: 100%; height: 38px; line-height: 40px; padding: 0px 15px; outline: 0px; border: 0px; background: #fff; color: #fff; font-size: 14px; letter-spacing: 0.25px;}#lp-footer form .input-group-field{ height: 38px !important;}#lp-footer form button { padding: 0px 30px; height: 38px; line-height: 40px; outline: 0px; border: 0px; color: #fff; background: #998b4c; font-size: 18px; -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease;}#lp-footer form button:hover { background: #998b4c;}
footer.html:
{footer_title}

{footer_desc}

    {social}
{footer_copyright}

loop.name: mainslider-img
loop.structure:
{title}
{description}
Click nhận ưu đãi

mainslider.css: @media (max-width: 768px) { #lp-main-slider{ margin-bottom: 30px !important; } #custom1 .owl-dots{ bottom:0px !important; } #lp-main-slider .slider-content{ top: 15% !important; line-height: 24px !important; left:10% !important; width:255px !important;}#lp-main-slider .txt1{ padding-bottom: 0px !important; font-size: 18px !important; padding-left: 0px !important; letter-spacing: 3px !important; line-height: 25px !important;}#lp-main-slider .txt1 strong{ font-size: 20px !important;}#lp-main-slider .txt1 span{ font-size: 16px !important;}#lp-main-slider .txt2{ font-size: 18px !important; line-height: 20px !important; margin-bottom: 10px !important;}#lp-main-slider .slider-btn{ margin-top: 0px;}#lp-main-slider .slider-btn a{ padding: 3px 8px !important;}}#lp-main-slider{ margin-bottom: 40px; position: relative; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; z-index: 9;}#lp-main-slider #custom1 img{ width: 100%;}#lp-main-slider #custom1 .owl-dots{ position: absolute; bottom: 10px; margin: 0 auto; width: 100%;}#lp-main-slider #custom1 .owl-dots .owl-dot{ margin-bottom: 15px;}#lp-main-slider #custom1 .owl-dots .owl-dot span{ background: rgba(#F09AA4, 0.7);}#lp-main-slider #custom1 .owl-dots .active span{ background: #F09AA4; width: 9px; height: 9px; margin: 5px 7px; display: block;}#lp-main-slider .slider-content{ position: absolute; top: 20%; color: #fff; font-weight: 400; left: 40%; width: 520px; text-align: center;}#lp-main-slider .slider-content .txt1{ text-transform: capitalize; font-size: 65px; padding-bottom: 5px; color: #F09AA4; font-weight: bold; line-height: 110px; letter-spacing: 10px; /* font-family: 'Open Sans', sans-serif; */ font-family: 'SVN-FreshScript';}#lp-main-slider .slider-content .txt2{ font-size: 35px; line-height: 55px; /* font-weight: bold; */ color: #868686; margin-bottom: 40px; font-family: 'Arsenal', sans-serif; letter-spacing: 0.5px;}#lp-main-slider .slider-content .slider-btn{ text-transform: uppercase;}#lp-main-slider .slider-content .slider-btn a{ color: #ffffff; padding: 10px 25px; border-radius: 25px; background: #f09aa4; font-size: 16px; letter-spacing: 1.5px; -webkit-transition: all 0.3s ease; -moz-transition: all 0.3s ease; transition: all 0.3s ease; border:solid 2px #f09aa4;}#lp-main-slider .slider-content .slider-btn a:hover{ color:#484848; background: none; border:solid 2px #f09aa4;}
mainslider.html: {mainslider-img}
mainslider.js: (function () { $('#custom1').owlCarousel({ dragEndSpeed: 1000, navSpeed: 1000, dotsSpeed: 1000, loop: true, margin: 0, callbacks:true, URLhashListener: true, startPosition: 'URLHash', nav: false, dots: true, responsiveClass: true, responsive: { 0: {items: 1, }, 480: { items: 1, }, 768: { items: 1 }, 900: { items: 1 }, 1000: { items: 1 } } }); })();
